# Schema: `ColumnLineageEdge`

A column-level lineage edge tracing a target column back to a source column.

- Type: `object`

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `function` | `string` | `false` | Function name if transform_type is EXPRESSION (e.g., SUM, CASE). |
| `id` | `integer` | `false` | - |
| `lineage_edge_id` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `source_column` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `source_schema` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `source_table` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `target_column` | `string` | `false` | - |
| `transform_type` | `string` | `false` | Whether the column is a direct pass-through or computed via an expression. |
